context: Do you need an internet connection to play this game?

All the information your computer needs in order to fully display and run Master Poker is contained on the CD; therefore, no Internet connection is required.

context: How does this stand up to jumping? I tend to be a jumper when I'm playing, and i was wondering if this is going to slip?
response: This will likely depend on the surface upon which you place the pad. I use mine on a low-pile carpet and although the cheap (no foam, very thin) versions tend to slip a bit, these are pretty solid. Even after a very energetic song, the pads have seldom moved more than an inch or two from their original location.

context: Do the rechargeable batteries 'really' only last 48-hours? (if so, then it's not 'really' wireless)
response: With moderate to heavy use, I get at least 5 or 6 days out of the mouse before I recharge it. The keyboard will go two weeks or more. Both would surely last much longer if I turned them off when I'm not using them; but I don't. Recharging takes about 20 minutes using the supplied usb cable.

context: My grandsons told me that I sent them the wrong giants. They want the ones that are physically larger. How can I tell by the package.
response: Where the phrase Skylanders giants is on the package. For the "Giant" characters the name "Skylanders Giants" is towards the bottom of the package on the plastic.While on the smaller packages it's on the cardboard backing above the figure.
